title: Degrees and Education
intro: My studies have built a strong foundation in computer science, covering a wide range of fields such as artificial intelligence, cryptography, and web application development. The academic projects I completed allowed me to apply this knowledge in real-world contexts. Here you'll find a detailed presentation of my degrees, institutions, and acquired skills.

degrees.title: Master in Computer Science
degrees.description: During my Master's program, I studied a wide range of subjects such as networking and routing, advanced algorithms, artificial intelligence, cryptography, and database management. I also deepened my knowledge in machine learning and various data analysis methods, including natural language processing (NLP). This enabled me to understand both theoretical and practical aspects of big data processing and security.
projects: Blockchain project implementing block creation, consensus algorithms, and data security.
Secure peer-to-peer routing solution developed during internship.
Image classification and text processing using deep learning and NLP.

degrees.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
degrees.description: In the third year of my Bachelor's program, I studied an introduction to artificial intelligence and basic AI algorithms. One key topic was logic, which helped me learn to break down complex queries into simpler concepts. I also explored how processors work and handle data, giving me a solid understanding of computer architecture.
projects: Database design and development of web interfaces with interactive elements.
Created a pseudo-3D video game for immersive experience.
Developed a basic AI to challenge human players in a game.

degrees.title: DUT in Computer Science
degrees.description: My studies at IUT d'Orsay were an exciting introduction to the world of IT. I learned programming languages such as Java, C++, and .NET, along with database management using Oracle SQL. I also gained skills in search and sorting algorithms, which were essential to my future development.
projects: Built a PHP website for users to create and share Christmas gift lists.
Developed a multilingual .NET game catalog with customizable interface.
Internship: created a modern, responsive website aligned with current standards.

meta.title: Degrees and Education – Iliya Glazunov
meta.description: Explore Iliya Glazunov's academic background, including Master's, Bachelor's, and DUT degrees in computer science with a focus on AI, cryptography, blockchain, and software development projects.
